document_data.name: Lethchauntos
document_data.class3e: {{class table|edition=3e|[[Wizard]]|15<ref group="note">Based on Lethchauntos being credited with creation of the ''[[Ettin Axe of Uruth]]'', he was a wizard of at least 15{{th}} level.}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Lethchauntos the Black''' was a powerful and [[evil]] [[mage]]{{Cite dragon/69/More Pages from the Mages|69}} active in the [[Sword Coast]] as of the 10{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: At some point prior to the {{YearlinkName|936}}, Lethchauntos travelled to live among the [[orcs]] of [[Uruth Ukrypt]], led by the [[shaman]] [[Wund]]. While there, he crafted the ''[[Ettin Axe of Uruth]]'' as a gift to the orcish realm's first king, [[Uruth]], and at some point he parlayed with the [[sage]] [[Orfidel]]. He was believed to be one of the first known owners of ''[[The Nathlum]]'', a tome of [[poison]]s and evil [[magic]], although he lost possession of the book during the [[Orcfastings War]] of 936 DR.
